title: Help For Jinx pls ^-^
body: Hello Everyone :p I just want know if someone know how to play very good {{champion:222}} . Yes i know how to play it but...  I don't really know what objects pick, like, {{item:3085}} Or {{item:3087}} ?? {{item:3087}} First or {{item:3006}} With Red Echentement first?  {{summoner:4}} , or {{summoner:14}} ? {{summoner:7}} Or {{summoner:14}} ?????  What is the Best skin?? ty ^-^ ♥{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
I WANT TO BE SHTO TO DEATH BY JINX!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
> IF YOU WANT IT, DO AN 1V1 WITH ME ! {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} ~~~~Jinx Jinx Jinx Jinx Jinx Jinx The Jinx~~~~ _WEEE_

Thank you BarryButcher for this.
Persons say me to pick an ignite on adc --'
The items is very good thank you
And i can say you i have all the skins of jinx ! :3 i have slayer mafia and fireckarcker. thank you.

Heal is what most ADC's take.  Ignite is err... You can take it if you really want it, but heal is a generally better option. Take different summoner spells than the usual if you feel you can come up with your own builds and stuff like that.
